name: Patronus Girl
description:
I hate nightmares
Because it makes me unable to sleep, tired and easily irritated.
But if there is no nightmare I probably won't have a chance to meet “Patronus girl" and probably did not know about falling in love.

When i have bad dreams Whether it's experiencing disappointment, being chased, or dreaming of seeing zombies.
A woman will appear. She was dressed in a dress that looked sassy. flashed out of the body and drive away the nightmare from me
Her smile comforted me when I was scared.

Unfortunately we have to say goodbye every time I wake up.
Sometimes I want to take sleeping pills. to be with you forever But in the end I realized that was a very stupid idea. both about how I fell in love with my own guardian and that I almost killed myself to be with her

In the end, I decided to draw her on paper. Although it's not as beautiful as the one I saw in my dreams. but enough to compensate I put that picture on my desk. And whether you believe it or not I hardly had nightmares again. It was as if she was protecting me every moment.
